{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3089551,"name":"Joel Smith (Mentor)","username":"drphiltron","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/drphiltron/{size}/178100_2.png","created_at":"2022-10-17T13:34:41.661Z","cooked":"

Does anyone know if there is there a plan to send the RoboRIO 2.0 to teams this season in the KoP? We have been trying to get one since last season and they haven’t been available. We also haven’t been able to get ahold of the new REV PDH either.

See this blog post from June 7th regarding the 2023 control system.

","post_number":2,"post_type":1,"posts_count":6,"updated_at":"2022-10-17T13:41:28.443Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":269,"readers_count":268,"score":88.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":416255,"topic_slug":"roborio-2-0-2023-season","display_username":"Brian Wagg","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://www.firstinspires.org/robotics/frc/blog/2022-2023-control-system-info","internal":false,"reflection":false,"title":"2023 Control System Info | FIRST","clicks":84}],"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":2}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":19532,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Brian Wagg"},"post_url":"/t/roborio-2-0-2023-season/416255/2","custom_user_title":"Brian Wagg","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":2}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":2,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3089565,"name":"","username":"Thor5090","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/thor5090/{size}/226064_2.png","created_at":"2022-10-17T14:05:45.953Z","cooked":"

I read somewhere that they would come in the rookie kits but thats it. And to note that the black tote that everyone else gets will not have the 2 motor controllers in it this year. That was one of the major reasons we are opting out of the black tote this year.

","post_number":3,"post_type":1,"posts_count":6,"updated_at":"2022-10-17T14:05:45.953Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":2,"reads":243,"readers_count":242,"score":73.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":416255,"topic_slug":"roborio-2-0-2023-season","display_username":"","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":1}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":53198,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"My views are mine and mine alone"},"post_url":"/t/roborio-2-0-2023-season/416255/3","custom_user_title":"My views are mine and mine alone","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":1,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3089583,"name":"Brian Wagg","username":"cad321","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/c/c57346/{size}.png","created_at":"2022-10-17T15:06:21.625Z","cooked":"

I’ll also add that @Andy_Baker mentioned back in mid September that they are indeed expecting a “larger” batch (larger being in reference to the small batches of 100 units they’ve received recently) of RIO’s to be en route.

[FRC Blog] ImPIHRRfect Supply Chains General Forum
Yes, but in a limited quantity. We just had a small batch of 100 pass through a couple of weeks ago. We notified the few hundred people who put in their address to the “sign up for a notification when available” within the roboRIO product page. I recommend anyone to put their email in there if they want notified when they become available. During the last small batch sale, we limited individual orders to qty. 1 per order. It’s been many years since we did anything like that. We were just not…

Fingers crossed before kickoff
